amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill may be expended by the Department of the Interior to approve any exploration plan, any development and production plan, any application for permit to drill or to permit any drilling on certain Outer Continental Shelf Southern California Planning Area leases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be expended by the Department of the Interior to approve any exploration plan, any development and production plan, any application for permit to drill or to permit any drilling on certain Outer Continental Shelf Southern California Planning Area leases.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Lois Capps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 172 (Roll no. 315).
